ygData.subject: Re: Bard songs canceling spell effects, bug or feature?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... thats new to me, thanks for the info. Heh, i only use the mask because everybody else in my group does and its just funny to see a full party of dark elves
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:25 PM 6/30/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
>you don't have to camp. just like in the past when a procing weapon made
>our songs stick, you can click on and off a song as fast as you can like 15
>or so times to unstick it, it works eventually.
>
>luckily i look so much better as a wood elf than dark elf i don't use my
>mask too much unless to show i'm in an evil bad mood =P
>
>Shada Silverleaf, Level 48 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
>Erisi, Level 6 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
>

thats new to me, thanks for the info. Heh, i only use the mask because
everybody else in my group does and its just funny to see a full party of
dark elves trouncing around everywhere. Course the troll and ogre warrior
in our group love it for size reasons...

but i still havent heard an answer... is the canceling effect of songs like
levitate/underwater breathing intentional or a bug?

Gendal Concorden of Tunare, Lvl 37 bard
(who was disappointed to read about the damage shields perhaps not dealing
more but even less damage :()
